Text:
To the only 3 seeders at this time:

Please seed for another half-day or so, so that the rest of us who stick around can seed and keep this torrent alive now that the US SEGA server is dead.

Let's get it!!
I will seed at 200+kbps easy just seed and ill keep it on for aslong as my pc stays alive.. KEEP PSU ALIVE

Wow, i cant belive this is still alive. I remember playing the demo on 360, because they weren't shipping the game to my country. Finally i can play through the story, even though its singleplayer. Thank you for this awesome torrent. Will seed as much as i can.

I've been waiting for this torrent forever. I don't usually seed past 100% return rate but this... I'll do my best to keep it alive! Also, private server information if anyone wants it, go to http://psumods.co.uk/forums 

It's made by a veteran player updated and made better on an extremely regular basis and has a great community!
Any idea how to get the game to work?  Thanks.
do a google search for PSUmods, I haven't tried it yet but will when I get all the files downloaded, but they have created a private server for everyone!

Just finished downloading this, if it's legit I will constantly seed, I miss PSU and people need to see what such a great game this is.... just waiting for the main iso to download! if this torrent turns out to be fake or corrupt I will def let everyone know, if you don't hear from me than this is def a good DL
Hay guys just started downloading its slow as heck but i will seed for at least 3 months when its done peace (btw if it doesn't work ill still seed because it works for some ppl I LOVE PSU!!!!)
